ai_summary.summary:
Most reviewers were unhappy with their experience overall. Customers have expressed concerns about payment issues and subscription practices. Many consumers report unexpected charges and difficulties canceling their subscriptions, with some describing the cancellation process as intentionally complicated and misleading. Several reviewers feel that the company is a scam, citing unauthorized charges and a lack of clear information regarding costs.

While some people found the product helpful, particularly regarding weight loss and fasting schedules, there is no consensus regarding the app and user experience. Some reviewers appreciate the customer support, while others report issues with add-ons and a lack of user-friendliness. Overall, people suggest caution due to billing and cancellation problems.

reviews.text:
To jest WIELKIE oszustwo!!! 

Napisałam wiele maili, prosząc o pomoc w anulowanie subskrypcji lub jej anulowanie przez nich, bo ja nie jestem w stanie tego zrobić według ich instrukcji. Ciagle każą wcisnąć "anuluj subskypcję " gdzie taka "opcja" wcale na stronie nie widnieje. Fizycznie coś takiego sie w ogole nie pojawia więc nijak można to zrobić. Twierdzą że ma być wypełniona na koniec ankieta która również sie nie wyświetla!!  W jednym mailu sugerują żeby kliknąć opcje na stronie ktora sugeruje naliczenie kosztow dodatkowych za anulowanie (825 zł !!!!) a w drugim mailu piszą, żeby tego nie klikać, bo to nie służy anulowaniu. Jeden mail  przeczy drugiemu wysyłanemu przez tą samą "osobę". Napisałam wszędzie gdzie sie da do nich, prosząc o anulowanie bez ponoszenia kosztow i nadal nic konkretnego. Mówię im ze nie da sie tego zrobic tak jak tlumaczą i dalej nic. Żaden inny portal nie utrudnia w tak perfidny sposób tak prostych rzeczy. Jest to całkowicie absurdalne jak naciągają ludzi !!! Ja chce zrezygnować w ten sam dzien, kiedy to kupiłam - to jest niepojęte jak utrudniany jest caly proces. Ich instrukcje maja się nijak do rzeczywistości i nic z nich nie wynika!!! A oni nie pomagają realnie gdzie na prośbę klienta mogliby sami to anulowac ab oszczędzić dalszych niedogodnosci. Nic poza wielkim stresem nie zyskałam. Nie rozumieją próśb wyraźnie artykułowanych.

W przypadku braku realnej pomocy z ich strony, będę zgłaszać to dalej do stosownych instytucji. Nigdy więcej nie chciałabym być klientem podobnej firmy. I ostrzegam każdego przed tym szemranym czymś.
reviews.title: Ludzie uważajcie!! To jest WIELKIE oszustwo!!

reviews.text: Erst einmal muss man dafür bezahlen. Dann wird einem immer mehr angedreht, wofür man noch mehr bezahlen muss. Jetzt wurde mir etwas berechnet, was ich nicht ausgewählt habe. Die Kündigung wird zu einer Mammutaufgabe.
reviews.title: Abzocke

reviews.text:
Ganz ganz schlimm. 
Ich hatte ein Probeabo genommen, aber für jeden einzelnen Zusatz muss ein weiteres kostenpflichtiges und echt teures, monatlich verlängertes Abo abgeschlossen werden, was man so schnell gar nicht realisiert - einmal Button angeklickt, wird das Konto einfach belastet. Es war ur mühsam, die Kontaktdaten herauszusuchen, wie man eigentlich das Abo kündigt. Ich habe mich außerdem beschwert und eine Rückzahung für das versehentlich abgeschlossene Abo verlangt. Zuerst reagierte die KI des Unternehmes minütlich, es wurden mir 50% refund angeboten, die ich akzeptiert habe. Und plötzlich konnte die KI "den hohen Kundenaufwand" nicht mehr bewältigen und schwieg 10 Tage. Nun habe ich ein Mail bekommen, in dem mir mitgeteilt wird, dass keine Daten von mir auffindbar sind, da meine Abos abgelaufen sind, und ich erneut Registrierungsinfos, PDFs der Rechnung (hatte ich im ersten Mail natürlich attached) sowie Kontonummer etc senden soll. Es ist eine absolute Farce, man hat nur Scherereien für nichts.
reviews.title: Ganz ganz schlimm

reply.message:
Carl,

Vielen Dank für Ihr Feedback. Es tut uns leid, dass Sie diese Erfahrung gemacht haben. Alle Zusatzfunktionen sind optional und können abgelehnt werden - keine wird automatisch hinzugefügt. Wenn ein Upgrade versehentlich aktiviert wurde, möchten wir das prüfen.

Unsere Kundenbetreuung bearbeitet zurzeit ein erhöhtes Anfragevolumen während der Feiertage, aber alle Fälle werden bearbeitet. Wenn nach Rechnungs- oder Zahlungsinformationen gefragt wurde, bedeutet das, dass die genaue Belastung in Ihrem Konto nicht gefunden werden konnte und zusätzliche Daten benötigt werden, um die Transaktion über andere Wege zu identifizieren.

Bitte senden Sie uns Ihre registrierte E-Mail-Adresse oder Benutzer-ID über das Trustpilot-Formular oder direkt an feedback@certifiedfasting.com, damit wir Ihre Zahlungen nachvollziehen und alles korrekt abschließen können.

– Certified Fasting Team

reviews.text:
Non riesco ad annullare l'abbonamento presso certifiedfasting.com.
Ho provato diverse volte ma non riesco ad annullarlo.
Vorrei aiuto per poter cancellare l'abbonamento.
reviews.title: Non riesco ad annullare l'abbonamento…

reply.message:
Francesca,

Ci dispiace che tu abbia avuto difficoltà a cancellare l’abbonamento. Puoi farlo in qualsiasi momento dal tuo account: Profilo → Account → Modifica → Piano → Cambia, quindi completa il breve questionario di uscita. Dopo averlo terminato, apparirà una finestra pop-up di conferma e riceverai un’e-mail di conferma della cancellazione.

Se non riesci a completare il processo o non ricevi la conferma, il nostro team può assisterti direttamente. Ti invitiamo a inviare il tuo indirizzo e-mail registrato o l’ID utente tramite il modulo interno di Trustpilot oppure a scrivere a feedback@certifiedfasting.com, così potremo controllare il tuo account e chiudere la procedura correttamente.

– Team Certified Fasting

reviews.text:
Bonjour, 
Attention!  un robot vous répond pour donner l’impression qu’ils veulent solutionner votre problème. 
J’ai mal noté Cerifiedfasting .
Depuis je reçois des mails incessants et répétitifs sans aucune solution proposée ni même un geste commercial.
Mieux vaut ne pas tenter l’expérience.
Un site malhonnête
reviews.title: Attention c’est un robot qui repondra

reply.message:
Bonjour,

Merci pour votre avis. Nous comprenons votre frustration. Pour préciser, notre assistant IA répond uniquement aux questions simples concernant la plateforme ou l’utilisation du compte - tous les cas techniques ou liés aux paiements sont traités par des agents humains, comme cela a été fait pour le vôtre. Selon notre système, vous avez déjà reçu une explication détaillée de la part d’un membre de notre équipe.

Comme indiqué, le paiement étant actuellement en litige, les fonds sont traités par la plateforme de paiement. Nous ne pouvons donc pas effectuer le remboursement directement - la résolution se poursuivra via leur procédure.

– Équipe Certified Fasting

reviews.text: Stoped using it after 2 months and they keep charging me
reviews.title: Stoped using it after 2 months and they…

reply.message:
Hello,

Thank you for your review. We’re sorry to hear about the ongoing charges. Please note that Certified Fasting plans work on a subscription basis, which is explained during registration and in the Terms of Service. This means payments renew automatically unless cancelled directly from your account.

If you no longer use the service, please share your registered email or user ID via the internal Trustpilot form or contact feedback@certifiedfasting.com so we can review your account and make sure everything is handled correctly.

– Certified Fasting team

reviews.text: Jedná se podvodníky, jakmile jim pošlete první platbu, začnou vám bez Vašeho vědomí strhávat další a další platby. Psala jsem jim opakovaně, ale zcela marně! Už mi sebrali místo původních 169 Kč postupně 2000 Kč! A to za necelých 14 dní!
reviews.title: Podvodná firma, hlavně nic neplaťte!

reply.message:
Jindřiška,

Děkujeme za vaši recenzi. Mrzí nás, že jste zaznamenala neočekávané platby a potíže s komunikací - chápeme, jak nepříjemné to je, a váš případ chceme prověřit co nejdříve. Pro upřesnění, platby jsou zpracovány pouze po potvrzení vybraného plánu. Pokud se tedy objevily další částky, prověříme váš účet, abychom pochopili, co se stalo, a zajistili nápravu.

Prosíme, sdílejte svou registrovanou e-mailovou adresu nebo uživatelské ID prostřednictvím interního formuláře Trustpilot nebo nás kontaktujte přímo na feedback@certifiedfasting.com, abychom mohli váš účet dohledat a vše vyřešit co nejdříve.

– Tým Certified Fasting

reviews.text:
I subscribed to CertifiedFasting as they were offering a one month trial which proved inconclusive.
They debuted me for another month without any advice or authorisation.  This despite my several messages informing them that I didn’t want to continue. Their response messages said that they were dealing with my request.this took a whole month.
I also opposed this debit through PayPal, however CertifiedFasting refused and said the service was rendered. 
They deliberately waited for the month to end to keep my money, before finally terminating this service that I hadn’t adhered to .
I feel they have been dishonest and unprofessional
reviews.title: I subscribed to CertifiedFasting as…

reply.message:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing your experience. We’re truly sorry for the frustration caused and understand how discouraging it can be when it feels like your case resolution isn’t receiving the urgency it deserves.

To clarify, as explained during registration, all Certified Fasting plans renew automatically unless cancelled directly through the user’s account before the next charge. If the process didn’t work as expected, our team can always assist and make sure no further payments occur. However, we recognize that delayed replies can make an already stressful situation worse - we’re doing our best to improve response times during this holiday period.

Please share your registered email address or user ID via the internal Trustpilot form or directly at feedback@certifiedfasting.com so we can review your case and ensure everything is resolved correctly and as soon as possible.

– Certified Fasting team

reviews.text:
Non riesco ad annullare l'abbonamento presso certifiedfasting.com.
Ho provato diverse volte e non si arriva all'annullamento.
Ho scritto anche a email del gruppo ma senza successo.
Vorrei aiuto per poter cancellare l'abbonamento.
reviews.title: Non riesco ad annullare l'abbonamento di certifiedfasting.com

reply.message:
Ciao,

Grazie per la tua recensione. Ci dispiace sapere che non sei riuscita a cancellare l’abbonamento e che non hai ricevuto risposta dal nostro team di assistenza. Tutti i piani Certified Fasting possono essere annullati direttamente dal profilo utente, ma se il processo non funziona correttamente, vogliamo controllare subito il tuo caso.

Sembra che le informazioni di identificazione fornite non siano sufficienti per rintracciare il tuo account. Ti chiediamo gentilmente di inviarci l’email di registrazione o l’ID utente (presente nell’email di conferma registrazione) tramite il modulo interno di Trustpilot o scrivendo a feedback@certifiedfasting.com, così potremo verificare e completare la cancellazione correttamente.

– Team Certified Fasting

reviews.text:
Abzocke hoch 10 - die vorautorisierung bei Paypal wird nicht gelöscht obwohl ich eine Bestätigung meines Widerrufs bekommen habe! 


Edit: jetzt wurde mein Konto sogar belastet obwohl es hieß die Autorisierung verschwindet und der Widerruf sei korrekt gewesen. Habe alles schriftlich.
An die email unten hab ich mich gewandt - keine Reaktion. 
Fälle bei Paypal sind eröffnet!
reviews.title: Abzocke hoch 10

reply.message:
Sandra,

Vielen Dank für Ihre Bewertung. Es tut uns sehr leid zu hören, dass nach Ihrer bestätigten Kündigung weiterhin eine Vorautorisierung bei PayPal sichtbar ist. Diese Situation sollte selbstverständlich nicht auftreten und muss überprüft werden.

Bitte teilen Sie uns Ihre registrierte E-Mail-Adresse oder Benutzer-ID über das interne Trustpilot-Formular oder direkt an feedback@certifiedfasting.com mit, damit wir Ihr Konto finden und sicherstellen können, dass alles korrekt abgeschlossen wurde.

– CertifiedFasting Team

reviews.text:
Ho autorizzato solo 1 settimana di prova 7 euro e dopo 5 minuti ne scalano altri 29.95 senza che avessi nemmeno visualizzato il piano. Ho fatto appena in tempo a bloccare ulteriori addebiti. Ho scritto direttamente all'azienda e mi hanno risposto che devono valutare. Inoltre al momento del pagamento viene scaricata un'altra applicazione che ho subito disinstallato perchè per inserire i dati venivano chiesti altri soldi. Oltre al danno pure la sensazione di essere un pesce lesso per esserci cascati. Ad oggi ho potuto visualizzare il piano che risulta bloccato. L'azienda mi chiede altre informazioni per valutare il caso !! Tutto tempo perso.
Ultimo aggiornamento : dopo 2 giorni ho ricevuto i rimborsi richiesti ! Almeno la sensazione di essere un pesce lesso se ne è andata. Grazie
reviews.title: Lasciate perdere. Ho autorizzato 1 settimana di prova 7…

reply.message:
Pina,

Siamo felici di sapere che il tuo caso è stato risolto e che hai ricevuto il rimborso. Ti ringraziamo per aver aggiornato la tua recensione e per averci dato l’opportunità di correggere la situazione. I tuoi commenti ci aiutano a migliorare continuamente l’esperienza dei nostri utenti.

– Team Certified Fasting

reviews.text: Como coinciden varios de los comentarios es una app que te ofrece una promoción pero cobra todo luego adicional, además luego empiezan a hacer cobros en tu tarjeta y te ponen a trámites para solicitar devoluciones. Tiene muy buenas recetas y seguimiento pero es un problema para salirse y te cobran porque si, tuve que cancelar mi tarjeta y solicitar una nueva porque hacen cobros sin autorización. Mencionan que se ponen en contacto contigo pero lo único que dicen es que tienen muchos mensajes, no recomiendo que entren a esta plataforma es una estafa total!
reviews.title: No recomendada

reply.message:
Juan,

Intentamos ponernos en contacto contigo a través de Trustpilot para revisar los cargos que mencionas, pero no recibimos respuesta. Si la situación aún no está completamente resuelta, por favor escríbenos directamente a feedback@certifiedfasting.com para que podamos revisarla y asegurarnos de que todo esté correcto.

– Equipo Certified Fasting

reviews.text: WARNING THIS IS A TOTAL SCAM. I cancelled subscription and they have continued to take money out of my account.  Only way to stop them is to get a new bank card which has been a huge inconvenience.  When I contacted them about cancelling they asked me to click on the link and use the original card and they will refund.  They took a further $250 form my account.
reviews.title: WARNING THIS IS A TOTAL SCAM

reply.message:
Hello,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We’re deeply concerned by what you’ve described, as no new payments should ever occur after a confirmed cancellation - and certainly not through any support communication. This situation must be reviewed immediately.

Please contact us directly at feedback@certifiedfasting.com or respond to the Trustpilot information request so we can locate your account and check exactly what happened. Our team will make sure it’s properly investigated and resolved as soon as possible.

– Certified Fasting team

reviews.text:
Kate,
Thank you for the reply.

The most annoying thing on your entire program is that it is almost impossible to get out of the program. When you try to get out you are being trapped into many other questions and options.
Do you realise that this is forbidden in the EU? The law states that the ease of how you can subscribe should be the same as getting out or cancelling your subscription. And that is absolutely not the case in your program!.
The same as being clear who the consumer is dealing with, this should be findable within one click and the saem as who and where you're paying to.
You can say that it is mentioned on your website but it is hidden on your website, almost impossible to find and that is legally not allowed.

There are many more traps in your program and apps which are not allowed. In case you think that being settled in Cyprus creates escapes for you legally, then you are wrong too.

Maybe you should take a proper look at your reviews. The Majority of the complaints are all the same. Same as your lame excuses, giving people the idea you understand them but doing not further more with it.

I think it is time that you change your policy immediately, especially because I'm gonna make a note about this at the legal authorities.
Besides the fact of your fake positive reactions in the reviews, your website is a huge trap!

Take some actions and stop behaving like this.
Yours sincerely
BDTvH
reviews.title: Scam

reply.message:
Bert,

Thank you for your update and for taking the time to share your detailed feedback. We understand your frustration and take your concerns very seriously. The situation you’ve described should never feel unclear, and we want to review your case thoroughly to make sure everything is handled correctly.

Your comments about transparency and legal clarity have been noted and will be passed to our legal and compliance team for review, to ensure all information and processes remain up to date, compliant with legal requirements, and fully transparent for our customers.

We previously replied to your earlier review in October but were unable to proceed, as no contact information was provided at the time. To resolve this properly, please reply to the Trustpilot information request or contact feedback@certifiedfasting.com. Our team will personally review your account, confirm its status, and make sure no further issues remain.

– Certified Fasting team

reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. The whole process of cancelling the subscription is made so difficult. I was prompted to select: I acknowledge that I have to pay 1735 Ron (340 EUR) if I would ever come back to certifiedfasting.com - that's a clear sign of the AMOUNT of this scam. During the process I even clicked on some button to get a new meal and instantly I got charged with 99 Ron. Imagine that! What a scammy site. Now I could only closet nu credit card and report the diet-cf.com tranzacționa in the hope of getting nu money back. Avoid certifiedfasting like the Plague.
reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would

reply.message:
Hello,

We’re glad to confirm that your case was reviewed and resolved by our team on December 12, 2025, with a refund issued to your original payment method. We appreciate your patience and hope everything has since been fully settled.

– Certified Fasting team

reviews.text:
Scam website
I contacted my cc company and cancelled the payments and reported it as a scam 
Everyone should do that
reviews.title: Scam website

reply.message:
Hello Jose, 

Thank you for sharing your concern. What you describe doesn’t sound right, and we’d really like to understand what led to this experience. Payments on our service can only be processed after a plan is selected and confirmed, so reviewing your specific case will help us clarify what happened.

Please respond to the Trustpilot information request or reach out to us at feedback@certifiedfasting.com, and we’ll look into your account directly.

- Certified Fasting Team

reviews.text:
Experiența mea cu CertifiedFasting este foarte dezamăgitoare. Am fost taxată pentru un abonament pe care nu îl pot anula din platforma lor. Am contactat serviciul de suport, însă nu am primit niciun răspuns.
Tot ce îmi doresc este anularea abonamentului și oprirea oricăror plăți viitoare. Un serviciu serios ar trebui să răspundă la solicitările clienților, mai ales când este vorba despre probleme de facturare.
Sper ca situația să fie rezolvată în curând, însă până acum experiența a fost extrem de frustrantă și neprofesionistă.
reviews.title: este un site nesigur

reply.message:
Irena,

Am încercat să luăm legătura cu tine prin Trustpilot pentru a rezolva situația, însă nu am primit detaliile necesare pentru a identifica contul. Dacă problema este încă activă, te rugăm să ne contactezi direct la feedback@certifiedfasting.com - vom verifica abonamentul și ne vom asigura că totul este gestionat corect.

– Echipa Certified Fasting

reviews.text: Chcę zrezygnować z substrykcji i nie mogę tego zrobić, już dawno minął czas wykupienia a ja nie mogę z tego zrezygnować
reviews.title: Chcę zrezygnować z substrykcji i nie…

reply.message:
Cześć,

Dziękujemy za Twoją wiadomość. Rezygnacja z subskrypcji powinna być zawsze możliwa w ustawieniach konta, więc chcemy sprawdzić Twoją sprawę i ustalić, dlaczego nie możesz jej dokończyć.

Odpowiedz proszę na prośbę Trustpilot o dane lub napisz do nas na feedback@certifiedfasting.com, abyśmy mogli odszukać Twoje konto i pomóc w rozwiązaniu sytuacji.

- Certified Fasting Team

reviews.text: Arnaque, :le site, est fait pour qu on clic sur de nouvelles, propositions sans, arrêt avant de pouvoir ree'ement commander. 4prelevement et un abonnement non sollicité
reviews.title: Arnaque

reply.message:
Bonjour,

Merci d’avoir partagé votre expérience. Nous comprenons que le processus d’inscription puisse paraître déroutant lorsque des offres supplémentaires apparaissent, même si celles ci sont entièrement optionnelles et peuvent être refusées. Nous souhaitons nous assurer que tout soit clair et correctement traité.

Nous confirmons avoir bien reçu votre message dans notre système. Notre équipe examine actuellement votre dossier et vous reviendra par e mail avec une solution.

- Certified Fasting Team

reviews.text: Son unos timadores. Mi caso es que pagué una suscripción para probar de 6 euros en una semana. Mi error poner tarjeta. Se están cobrando sin mi consentimiento cuando me he dado de baja en el servicio. Voy a intentar poner una denuncia y dar de baja la tarjeta para que no se hagan más cobros. NO LO USÉIS
reviews.title: Son unos timadores

reply.message:
Hola,

Gracias por compartir tu experiencia. Entendemos lo preocupante que es ver cargos inesperados, especialmente después de darte de baja. Nuestros planes se renuevan automáticamente a menos que se cancelen antes, como se explica durante el registro, y nos gustaría revisar tu caso para entender qué ha ocurrido y asegurarnos de que todo esté claro.

Por favor, contacta con nosotros en feedback@certifiedfasting.com para que podamos localizar tu cuenta y ayudarte directamente.

- Certified Fasting Team
